mapper.select: SELECT * FROM watched_movie_record wmr JOIN movie_dto md ON wmr.movie_no = md.id WHERE record_no = #{recordNo}
SELECT YEAR(watched_date) AS YEAR ,COUNT(*) AS count FROM watched_movie_record WHERE member_no = #{memberNo} GROUP BY YEAR(watched_date), member_no

SELECT gd.id, gd.name, COUNT(*) AS genre_count FROM genre_dto gd JOIN movie_genre mg ON gd.id = mg.genre_id JOIN watched_movie_record wmr ON mg.movie_id = wmr.movie_no JOIN member m ON m.member_no = wmr.member_no WHERE wmr.member_no = #{memberNo} GROUP BY gd.id, gd.name;

SELECT DISTINCT gd.id, gd.`name` FROM genre_dto gd JOIN movie_genre mg ON gd.id = mg.genre_id JOIN watched_movie_record wmr ON mg.movie_id = wmr.movie_no JOIN member m ON m.member_no = wmr.member_no WHERE wmr.member_no = #{memberNo};
